fields.headline: MGEITF update
fields.bodyText: Paul Gibbs, director of programming at Al Jazeera International, David Abraham, executive vice president and general manager of TLC, and Jill Offman, senior vice president at Discovery Networks Europe, have confirmed they are to speak at this year's festival. With the launch of Al Jazeera International imminent, Gibbs will talk about his plans and ambitions for the channel in the global market. The second international controllers session will be a combined discussion with Abraham and Offman. The festival is open to anyone working in the broadcasting industry and takes place from 12.30pm on Friday August 25 to Sunday August 27. To register or for further updates go to www.mgeitf.co.uk
